reference.title: India
reference.shortdesc: Applicability: WAN devices that support SMS The sending and receiving of texts is supported in the following Indian languages:

section.p: Assamese, Bengali, Gujarati, Hindi, Kannada, Kashmiri, Konkani, Malayalam, Manipuri, Marathi, Nepali, Oriya, Punjabi, Sanskrit, Sindhi, Tamil, Telugu, Urdu, Bodo, Santhali, Maithili, and Dogri.
